original_title: The Prophet of Prosperity: Robert Tilton and the Gospel of Greed
overview: Ok, let's admit it. We all miss him. Sure, there's Jan & Paul Crouch and even Pray TV's "hair apparent," Pastor Benny Hinn - but nobody, nobody, nobody can hold a collection plate up to "Brother Bob" Tilton. You know it. we know it. And most of all, he knows it.
tagline: He's the 800-pound gorilla of religious entertainment.
title: The Prophet of Prosperity: Robert Tilton and the Gospel of Greed
